name: pdf-clinic
description: Transform your PDFs with PDF Clinic - Professional PDF editing made simple everywhere

scripts.build: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd server && npm run test:watch" "cd client && npm run test:watch"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:server -- --coverage && npm run test:client -- --coverage

author: PDF Clinic Team
